title: Shrek
description: In a bid to get his land back, Shrek agrees to retrieve Princess Fiona for the fairytale-hating Lord Farquaad of Duloc, but falls in love with her on the way.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
description: One year since the supernatural nightmare at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, the stories about what transpired there have been twisted into a campy local legend, inspiring the town's first ever Fazfest.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's
description: Recently fired and desperate for work, a troubled young man named Mike agrees to take a position as a night security guard at an abandoned theme restaurant.

title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
description: The Grinch decides to rob Whoville of Christmas, but a dash of kindness from little Cindy Lou Who may melt his heart.

title: The Grinch
description: The Grinch hatches a scheme to ruin Christmas when the residents of Whoville plan their annual holiday celebration.

title: TRON: Ares
description: A highly sophisticated Program called Ares is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A special bond develops between inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada.

title: A Minecraft Movie
description: Four misfits are pulled into the Overworld and must master it to return home.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
description: Sonic and Tails are on a new adventure where they must stop a new evil force.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: After settling in Green Hills, Sonic must face Dr. Robotnik once again.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Powered with incredible speed, Sonic The Hedgehog embraces his new home on Earth until Sonic sparks the attention of super-uncool evil genius Dr. Robotnik. Now it's super-villain vs. super-sonic in an all-out race across the globe to stop Robotnik from using Sonic's unique power for world domination.

title: The Simpsons Movie
description: After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll. He sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A young Viking apprentice must train dragons to become a true warrior. Together with a young dragon, he discovers that dragons are not the mindless beasts everyone believes them to be.

title: Red One
description: After Santa's North Pole base is destroyed, a daring rescue mission is launched to save the day and preserve Christmas for the world.

title: Lilo & Stitch
description: A lonely girl befriends an alien experiment and together they discover the meaning of ohana (family). Their chaotic adventures test the bonds of friendship and love.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence, leading to a clash on how to save it.
